display_long_description:
# Unlock your inner Guitarist with IMMERROCK!

Learn to play your guitar with IMMERROCK. Play your first song in minutes!  Enjoy a fun, engaging, and easy learning experience with +300 exercises that evolve with you. 
[media]

# **EXERCISES THAT EVOLVE WITH YOU**
Access 300+ smart exercises that adapt to your level.
[media]

# **SEE EXACTLY WHERE TO PLACE YOUR FINGERS**
Clear, real-time finger guidance shows you exactly where to place your fingers.
[media]

# **CHORDS MADE SIMPLE**
Learn from zero, practice with a fun guided path, and master chords to play your first song in minutes.
[media]

# **PRACTICE AT YOUR OWN PACE**
Adjust speed, loop song sections, or go at your own pace with Wait Mode.
[media]


Additional Features

🎵 Custom Songs: Convert your favorite tracks with Editor on Fire

🧠 Flexible Play Modes: Learn your way with Wait Mode, Practice Mode, and Master Mode.

🎸 In-App Guitar Tuner: Tune your guitar easily without leaving the app.


Join our Discord: https://www.discord.gg/SP4tumnEx6


**Note Detection Setup**

Requires you connect your guitar in one of several ways:

-1/4" TS to USB-C (with headphones)

-Real Tone cable + USB-C adapter

-Mini amp such as Boss Katana: GoB or Fender Mustang Micro Plus
